name: PIVOTO
description:
** Reviews and Accolades **

- Featured in "New games we love" of the App Store
- #2 Puzzle Game app ~ App Store
- #2 Arcade Game app ~ App Store
- #2 of Top 5 Best Puzzle Games For iOS / iPhone 2018 ~ Fliptroniks
- 4/5 "There are times when the word minimalism is taken seriously […] PIVOTO is an ideal example of this." ~ ANTYapps
- 7.5/10 "A good discovery that your iPhone or iPad will appreciate!" ~ KickMyGeek
- "PIVOTO comes up with a hectic gameplay despite a pleasant and relaxed atmosphere." ~ iPlayApps.de

** Main Features **

- User-friendly Level Editor (online & offline)
- 180 handcrafted levels
- Tons of user levels
- No Ads
- No in-app purchases
- Beautiful and minimal design, with 4 different themes
- Game Center integration with dozens of achievements, leaderboard
- Relaxing sound design and soundtracks
- iPhone X support

** About PIVOTO **

In this elegant, minimalist and addictive game, the goal is to help one or more balls to reach the end of a level by rotating mechanisms with your fingers.
As you will travel across the 180 levels of the game, new situations and shapes will require a good use of both your logic and dexterity for you to succeed.

From the start, you can adjust the speed of the ball and the difficulty level is gradually ascending so you can easily get into the game. Once you have mastered the simple levels, you'll have to handle two or more balls at the same time!

PIVOTO is easy to learn but challenging to master.
